name: #BlockSnake
description:
Step into the world of Bitcoin and learn about its history and mechanics through the classic game of snake. Discover the early days of Bitcoin when Satoshi Nakamoto introduced a decentralized digital currency and watch it evolve into the powerful technology it is today.

Join me on an exciting journey through the world of Bitcoin in BlockSnake!
This is just a prototype of what's to come. I have plans to implement more gameplay, including PvP mode, memory mode, multiple maps, challenges, and world rankings. Players will also have the option to earn their first Bitcoin by watching ads through the satsback option in the game.

If you believe in the potential of BlockSnake to educate and engage players about Bitcoin, consider donating to the Bitcoin crowdfunding campaign on: https://geyser.fund/project/blocksnake 

Your support will allow the complete version of the game to be developed and bring it to the masses.

Make sure to adjust the settings to your liking, specifically the sensitivity.

Your feedback and ideas are important. Share them on Twitter using the hashtag #BlockSnake and mention @GhostOfPashka. 

Enjoy the game!
